divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I both saw this while playing with our new telescope. Now we both know U.F.O.'s exsist but this is something on a whole new level for the both of us. We are still trying to process this. But here it is. I had aimed the scope at the moon to have a big object to see and bumped the telescope slightly and that is when it happened, I peered through the view finder, the moon was just out of sight and I could see lights or like a type of pulsating glow as I focused on it more, I was in shock it was the best way to say it a damm train in space! There was a type of lead vessel pulling 15 to 18 other vessel like containers each with a sort of pulsating glow from the bottom of each one after my Wife saw them to we couldn't even believe it, tried to explain it rationaly like maybe a reflection of something close by us but nothing would cause what we saw. I now think and I hate to say it but really believe there is a base on the moon being supplied right now.
